name: Across Lite Crossword Puzzle
summary: Learn about .PUZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PUZ files are provided by the New York Times and other publications. These files are typically made available as free downloads to premium subscribers. Daily crossword puzzles often have dated filenames, such as "apr0911-4.puz."
NOTE: Since PUZ files are saved in a proprietary format, they can only be opened with Across Lite, which is available as a free download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
